data.title: Miami
data.text: I was in awe at how smoothly my charter went. The crew was extremely friendly and made sure we had a great time. We had the option of taking a tour and dropping the anchor to swim at the sand bar. My group was running late that day and they started our charter when we left the pier and gave us the full four hours. Definitely something I plan to do again!

data.title: Experience to remember
data.text: When you need to rent a yacht for your family gathering the Tropical boat Yacht Charters is the right company for you. From the first inquiry to actual booking of a 70ft yacht Kate was very helpful in selecting a yacht as well as she was responsive regardless of the time of the day. Crew on the yacht was very attentive and provided first class service. I will recommend this company to all my friends for their water outings. Thank you Kate.

data.title: Great Service, Great Selection, Don't Hesitate!
data.text: Tropicalboat Charters had excellent service from beginning to end. Diane Diamantis is an excellent booking agent. She was responsive even on vacation and was extremely flexible to help suit my parties needs. We had 12 people on the "Prestige" yacht and our Captain Steve Houle and Stew Kristen made our afternoon yacht ride for my husband's birthday one we will never forget. The captain asked us what we wanted to do and allowed my party to feel very relaxed and free to enjoy ourselves to the fullest. Kristen kept the boat clean constantly, kept our cups full, and gladly set up all the food, drinks, and a birthday cake complete with a toast. If you are celebrating a special occasion or just want to have a very enjoyable afternoon, please consider booking. Thanks again to the team at Tropicalboat and again, a very huge thanks to Diane!

data.title: Great company
data.text: Great company with beautiful yachts and first class service. Lots of yachts to choose from, very helpful staff.
